name: Red Lobster Biscuits
author: Don and Clara Essner Family, Rachael schlosser
instructions: Preheat oven to 450Â°. Combine the Bisquick, milk and Cheddar cheese together with a wooden spoon until soft dough forms. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Drop dough by heaping tablespoons into an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes until golden brown. Combine melted butter or margarine with the garlic powder and brush it over the warm biscuits before removing them from the cookie sheet. Serve warm.
